Text.Page: I'd like you to check in at the Legion of Arms. Report to Midian at the western door, then get whatever training you need. The masters there are the very best.

Hmm. Turn around. Yes. Yes, you'll do fine. We can do a lot with you.

There are lot of new recruits here, fresh from their adventures, cocky and falsely self-sure. Avoid that trap and you'll live longer.
